title: Designing and Integrating Classroom Social Networks: Project-Based Intensive Short Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and understanding of elementary education curricula
context.additional_context: Course aimed at strengthening elementary teachers' competencies in building and managing classroom social networks linked to language education

learning_goals: Learners can select social network platforms suitable for classroom environments and develop operational plans.
Learners can design two or more social network-based project assignments to enhance language learning activities.
Learners can diagnose educational and technical issues that may arise when utilizing social networks and propose solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
